title: Lamb Shanks with Rich Red Wine and Tomato Sauce
ingredients: ['2 lamb shanks', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '1 glass red wine', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '2 medium onions, chopped', 'A pinch salt and pepper, for seasoning', 'pinch dried thyme', '2 sprigs fresh rosemary, and extra for garnish', 'About 1 or 2 tablespoons olive oil, for frying', '1 carrot, diced', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '150ml chicken stock']
